New Records: Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav led India to win the series 3-0 against Sri Lanka in the 3rd T20I match, with the match ending in a SUPER OVER.
Key Match Events: The match ended in a SUPER OVER as India and Sri Lanka tied the score, with India eventually winning the match.
Shubman Gill scored 39 off 37 balls for India.
Riyan Parag and Washington Sundar made important contributions for India.
Kusal Perera and Kusal Mendis played a stable knock for Sri Lanka, scoring 46 and 43 respectively.
Pathum Nissanka scored 26 for Sri Lanka.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka skipper Charith Asalanka won the toss and opted to field first.
India captain Suryakumar Yadav said they would have liked to chase, but the weather conditions made it difficult for the bowling team to control the ball.
Post-Match Reflections: India won the series 3-0 against Sri Lanka, with the match ending in a SUPER OVER.
Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav led India to victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Pallekele has favored the batters in the first two matches, and it is expected to do the same on Tuesday.
The live telecast of the match will be on the Sony Sports Network, while SonyLIV will provide the live streaming.
